testcase.name: Cogmento Free CRM Creating a new deal scenario
testcase.system-out: Given User is Already On Login PAGE.........................................passed When Title Of Login Page Is COGMENTO CRM....................................passed Then User enters Username AND Password......................................passed Then User clicks On LOGIN Button............................................passed Then User Is On HOMEPAGE....................................................passed Then User moves to DEAL Page................................................passed Then user enters DEAL details...............................................passed Then Close The BROWSER......................................................passed
